vocabulary.definition: healthy and good for your body
vocabulary.example: Vegetables are nutritious and help you grow strong

vocabulary.definition: the different foods you mix together to make something
vocabulary.example: The cake recipe has five different ingredients

vocabulary.definition: tasting very good
vocabulary.example: The homemade cookies were absolutely delicious

vocabulary.definition: instructions for how to cook or make food
vocabulary.example: Grandma shared her secret recipe for apple pie

vocabulary.definition: to gather crops when they are ready to eat
vocabulary.example: Farmers harvest corn in the fall

vocabulary.definition: newly made or picked, not old
vocabulary.example: Fresh strawberries taste better than old ones

vocabulary.definition: the taste of food
vocabulary.example: The soup had a rich, savory flavor

vocabulary.definition: having a hot, strong taste
vocabulary.example: The spicy chili made my mouth burn

vocabulary.definition: a style of cooking from a particular place
vocabulary.example: Italian cuisine includes pasta and pizza

vocabulary.definition: getting food ready to cook or eat
vocabulary.example: The preparation for Thanksgiving dinner takes all day

vocabulary.definition: a nutrient in food that helps build strong muscles
vocabulary.example: Fish and beans are good sources of protein

vocabulary.definition: healthy substances in food that your body needs
vocabulary.example: Oranges have lots of vitamin C

vocabulary.definition: having the right mix of different healthy foods
vocabulary.example: A balanced meal includes vegetables, protein, and grains

vocabulary.definition: done the same way for a long time
vocabulary.example: We eat traditional turkey dinner on Thanksgiving

vocabulary.definition: grown without chemicals or artificial substances
vocabulary.example: Organic apples are grown without pesticides

vocabulary.definition: to grow plants for food
vocabulary.example: The farmer cultivates tomatoes in his greenhouse

vocabulary.definition: to keep food fresh for a long time
vocabulary.example: We preserve fruit by making jam

vocabulary.definition: the feeling of wanting to eat
vocabulary.example: Running around outside gave me a big appetite

vocabulary.definition: how your body uses food for energy
vocabulary.example: Exercise can help speed up your metabolism

vocabulary.definition: relating to cooking and preparing food
vocabulary.example: The chef studied culinary arts in cooking school
